passive.name: DEATHBRINGER STANCE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DEATHBRINGER STANCE
                                Enhances his attack every 24 seconds to deal bonus physical damage equal to 4-13% () of the target's Maximum Health and heals himself for the same amount. Deathbringer Stance's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds when Aatrox hits a Champion or large monster with an attack or ability.Max 50 damage against monsters.Healing reduced to 60% against minions.

q.name: (Q) THE DARKIN BLADE
q.description:
(Q) THE DARKIN BLADE
 12/10/8/6s  
                                
                                
                                Swings his giant blade, dealing 57 physical damage (10/40/70/100 + 75/80/85/90% ). This ability can be cast 2 more times, with each cast dealing 25% more damage.Enemies hit on the sweetspot will be knocked airborne for 0.25 second(s) and dealt 60% bonus damage.Deals 65% damage to minions.Â Deals 70% damage to monsters.

w.name: (W) INFERNAL CHAINS
w.description:
(W) INFERNAL CHAINS
 15/14/13/12s  
                                
                                
                                Sends a chain dealing 50 physical damage (25/40/55/70 + 40% ) to the fist enemy hit and slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.If a Champion or large monster remains within the impact area after 1.5 second(s), they will be dragged back to the center and take the same damage again.Deals double damage to minions.

e.name: (E) UMBRAL DASH
e.description:
(E) UMBRAL DASH
 8/7/6/5s  
                                
                                
                                Passive: Aatrox gains 19/21/23/25% physical vamp against enemy champions.Active: Dashes forward. This resets Aatox's normal attack.Usable while casting other abilities.

r.name: (R) WORLD ENDER
r.description:
(R) WORLD ENDER
 75/65/55s  
                                
                                
                                Unleashes his demonic form for 10 seconds, gaining 30/40/50%% Attack Damage, 25/35/45% increased healing and 60/75/90% decaying Movement Speed. During this time, Umbral Dash's Physical Vamp in increased by 50%.World Ender's duration is extended by 5 seconds with a takedown, up to 10 extra seconds.Nearby minions and monsters are feared for 3 seconds on activaton.
notes: duration is extended by 5 seconds with a takedown, up to 10 extra seconds

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

runes_detailed.description: Gain tenacity for each Legend stack (max 10 stacks). Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, and minion kill.
After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal over time based on missing health.
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
